gcci.text: Global H100 supply stabilizes as new fab capacity comes online, easing procurement bottlenecks and shifting capex toward AI‑specific accelerators.

gtpi.text: API price wars intensify as model providers compress inference costs, driving token rates below $1/1M and spurring rapid efficiency gains.

gagl.text: Rising AI workloads strain the grid, accelerating nuclear baseload adoption to meet sustainability targets while reducing carbon footprints.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment reflects cautious optimism, with investors tempering bubble concerns as AI growth aligns with long‑term productivity gains.
